chapter.title: Server Tuning
chapter.para: This chapter contains best practices and general use guidelines to avoid service interruption by examining proper configuration of &susemgr; server components.

sect1.title: Apache Tomcat Connections
sect1.para: This section covers the Apache maxClients parameter in relation to Tomcat maxThreads.

warning.title: Changes to maxClient and maxThread Values
warning.para: Changes to these configuration files should only be done via support or consulting. These changes may interrupt service and should always be tested in a non production environment.

sect1.para: Both &susemgr; Apache maxClient and Tomcat maxThreads are set to a value of 200 by default. Apache maxClients must not be greater than the Tomcat maxThreads parameter.
